name: ProductCardTwo
description: Product card displaying brand name, star rating, and review count for social proof.

imageSrc.note: Supports external URLs with unoptimized prop

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

propsSchema.products: Array<{ id: string, brand: string, name: string, price: string, rating: number, reviewCount: string, imageSrc: string, imageAlt?: string, onFavorite?: () => void, onProductClick?: () => void, isFavorited?: boolean }>
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample: <ProductCardTwo products={[{ id: '1', brand: 'Wofurnitures', name: 'Single Accent Chair', price: '$650.00', rating: 4, reviewCount: '23.9k', imageSrc: '/product.jpg', onProductClick: () => window.open('https://example.com', '_blank') }]} title="Premium Collection" description="Explore our curated collection" textboxLayout="default" animationType="slide-up" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} />
